messages.content: You are an information extraction system.

You are an information extraction engine for job descriptions.

Your task:
Extract structured information from the job description and output ONLY valid JSON.

STRICT RULES (must follow):
- Output a single JSON object only.
- Do NOT include any explanation, commentary, or extra text.
- Do NOT repeat the job description.
- Use null for missing scalar fields.
- Use [] for missing list fields.
- Do NOT add any keys outside the schema.
- Keep the output concise. Do NOT write long sentences.
- Do not leave fields empty if the information is explicitly present. Extract as many distinct skills/tools as possible. Aim for 8–20 items in required_skills+preferred_skills+tools when applicable


LENGTH CONSTRAINTS (mandatory):
- responsibilities: at most 8 items, each item ≤ 12 words
- requirements: at most 10 items, each item ≤ 12 words
- preferred_qualifications: at most 6 items, each item ≤ 12 words
- skills: at most 20 items, each item ≤ 3 words
- Use short phrases, not full sentences.

SCHEMA:
{
  "role_title": string | null,
  "company": string | null,
  "location": string | null,
  "employment_type": string | null,
  "remote_policy": string | null,
  "responsibilities": string[],
  "requirements": string[],
  "preferred_qualifications": string[],
  "skills": string[],
  "years_experience_min": integer | null,
  "degree_level": string | null,
  "visa_sponsorship": string | null
}

JOB DESCRIPTION:
"""
{JD_TEXT}
"""

Remember:
- Short, compact, structured

{"role_title": "Research Scientist Intern, AI Core Machine Learning", "seniority": "intern", "location": "", "employment_type": "full-time", "required_skills": ["Python", "C++", "C", "Java", "deep learning frameworks such as Pytorch or Tensorflow", "machine learning and/or deep learning methods", "sequential decision-making algorithms"], "preferred_skills": ["intent to return to degree program after the completion of the internship/co-op", "first-authored publications at leading workshops or conferences such as NeurIPS, ICLR, ICML, AAAI, AISTATS, RecSys, KDD, IJCAI, CVPR, ECCV, ACL, NAACL, EACL, ICASSP, or similar", "solving analytical problems using quantitative approaches", "information retrieval problems, generative approaches, and/ or Natural Language Processing, CV, or Speech/ Audio", "software engineer experience via an internship, work experience, coding competitions, or widely used contributions in open source repositories (e.g. GitHub)", "cross functionally in a team environment"], "tools": ["Pytorch", "Tensorflow"], "years_experience": "", "responsibilities": ["Develop novel state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms and corresponding systems, leveraging various deep learning techniques", "Analyze and improve efficiency, scalability, and stability of corresponding deployed algorithms", "Perform state of the art research to advance the science and technology of Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence", "Devise better data-driven models for information retrieval, Multi-modal fusion, generation or media understanding (CV, NLP, Speech/ Audio)", "Collaborate with researchers and cross-functional partners including communicating research plans, progress, and results", "Contribute to research that can be applied to Meta product development"], "qualifications": ["Must obtain work authorization in country of employment at the time of hire and maintain ongoing work authorization during employment"]}
You are an information extraction system.

JOB DESCRIPTION:
"""
{JD_TEXT}
"""

Remember:
- Short, compact, structured

{"role_title": "PhD Graduate Software Engineer", "seniority": "staff", "location": "United States", "employment_type": "full-time", "required_skills": ["PhD degree in Computer Science, ML/AI, or equivalent practical experience", "Experience coding in Python, C, C++, Java, JavaScript, or Golang", "Experience in Machine Learning or Artificial Intelligence"], "preferred_skills": ["Research experience in designing, developing, or applying ML/AI systems or applications in a large-scale distributed environment", "Experience in designing, training, or refining complex ML/AI models", "Experience in deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow/Jax/Pytorch", "Experience in building a stack for an AI-powered application, including data ingestion and processing pipelines, building APIs, and connecting the model to a user-facing interface", "Familiarity with model architectures (CNNs, NLP Transformers, Diffusion/Vision Transformers)"], "tools": [], "years_experience": "3+ years", "responsibilities": ["Collaborate or lead on team projects to carry out design, analysis, and development of advanced ML systems across the stack using your research expertise", "Support building end-to-end ML Systems that involves working across the full stack, from low-level hardware acceleration and compiler optimizations to high-level model architecture and production APIs, transforming your research expertise into robust, scalable products", "Optimize complex system performance by analyzing and fixing performance bottlenecks, memory inefficiencies, and errors in production systems to meet stringent customer goals", "Elevate engineering excellence by writing well-tested code, conducting code reviews and fostering a culture of quality by advocating best engineering practices"], "qualifications": ["PhD degree in Computer Science, ML/AI, or equivalent practical experience", "Experience coding in Python, C, C++, Java, JavaScript, or Golang", "Experience in Machine Learning or Artificial Intelligence"]}
You are an information extraction system.

{"role_title": "Information Systems, IT, Cyber Engineer & Data Science - Recent Grad/Full Time", "seniority": "Recent Grad/Full Time", "location": "multiple locations across the United States", "employment_type": "full-time", "required_skills": ["Computer Science", "Computer Engineering", "Information Technology", "Data Science", "Cyber Security", "MIS"], "preferred_skills": [], "tools": [], "years_experience": "", "responsibilities": ["Assist in the design and implementation of information systems and IT solutions.", "Support cyber engineering initiatives to enhance security protocols and practices.", "Engage in data science projects to analyze and interpret complex data sets."], "qualifications": ["Must be pursuing a bachelor's degree (or higher) from an accredited college or university in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology, Data Science, Cyber Security, MIS or similar field", "Must have graduated or graduating from an accredited college or university between August 2025 and May 2026 and be available to begin full-time work between September 2025 - July 2026", "Must have obtained degree within 12 months of the date of hire"]}

"""

Remember:

{"role_title": "Marketing Data Analytics Summer Intern", "seniority": "intern", "location": "", "employment_type": "full-time", "required_skills": ["In pursuit of an undergraduate or graduate degree at a nationally accredited program.", "Able to independently manage new project work and facilitate change management when introducing new processes", "Naturally curious and able to learn quickly", "Experienced in data collection and building analytics dashboards", "Able to translate data and metrics into meaningful and understandable insights for stakeholders with varying levels of data understanding", "Confident and persuasive public speaker", "Analytical experience, interest and passion for solving business problems creatively", "Reliable transportation"], "preferred_skills": ["Major: Business Analytics, Management Information Systems (MIS), or Communications with an emphasis on Data Analytics", "Rising Junior (May 2028 Graduate) and/or Rising Senior (May 2027 Graduate)", "Experience with business intelligence platforms like Adobe Analytics, Tableau, and Power BI", "Familiarity with marketing platforms like HubSpot, Hootsuite and Campaign Monitor"], "tools": ["Adobe Analytics", "Tableau", "Power BI", "Smartsheet", "Qualtrics"], "years_experience": "", "responsibilities": ["Advance the Brand & Communications team in its analytics journey by tracking performance and developing measurement plans for various go-to-market initiatives", "Work with Digital Experiences team to convert data into insights for the broader organization", "Develop tools for specific projects with the intent of holding teams accountable to business objectives", "Work with leadership to assess AI usage and identify opportunities to implement stronger AI platforms", "Grow your technical and interpersonal skills by working with project teams to solve real-world problems", "Gain experience from a cross-functional global team and a dedicated mentorship"], "qualifications": ["Authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis. The company will not offer sponsorships or work visas now or in the future for this role"]}

JOB DESCRIPTION:
"""
{JD_TEXT}
"""

Remember:
- Short, compact, structured

{"role_title": "Entry-Level Technology Consultant", "seniority": "Entry-Level", "location": "Minneapolis, MN, Des Moines, IA, Kansas City, KS", "employment_type": "full-time", "required_skills": ["A bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Data Analytics, Quality Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field."], "preferred_skills": ["Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities", "Clear, confident communication skills", "A passion for technology and curiosity about how innovative solutions can make a real impact"], "tools": ["Artificial Intelligence", "Cutting-edge technologies", "Emerging tech", "Cloud-native engineering"], "years_experience": "", "responsibilities": ["Partner with clients to understand business challenges and contribute to solutions that matter.", "Work on modern, high visibility projects using cutting-edge technologies.", "Learn directly from experienced consultants through structured mentorship and ongoing development.", "Explore emerging tech—from artificial intelligence/machine learning to cloud-native engineering—through internal communities and training paths.", "Collaborate with national teams on projects that span industries including healthcare, retail, manufacturing, financial service, and more.", "Build a career path with clear opportunities for advancement, certifications, and specializations."], "qualifications": ["A growth mindset demonstrated through your coursework, internships, side projects, leadership roles, hackathons, research, or self-taught exploration.", "The enthusiasm to thrive in dynamic, fast-moving environments where teamwork and creativity fuel success."]}
